rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with a wheelchair-accessible ramp leading to the main living area.
Modern open-plan layout combining living and kitchen areas with ample natural light.
Seating area adjacent to the open living space for casual dining.
A multi-functional room serving as bedroom and study, designed to be wheelchair accessible with wide doorways.
Wheelchair accessible bathroom incorporating grab rails and adequate turning space.

openings.details: Large, low threshold door with ramp leading into the entrance lobby.
Large windows to maximize natural light following Vastu guidelines ensuring positive energy flow.
Accessible balcony leading to the rooftop terrace via a lift or ramp.

rooms.description: A modern rooftop terrace with seating area, green space, and accessibility features such as ramps.

openings.details: Wheelchair accessible elevator or inclined staircase providing access to the rooftop terrace.
Natural lighting integrated into the design in accordance with Vastu principles.
